title: Family Flees To 'Schitt's Creek' â€” That's 'Schitt' With A C
teaser: Eugene Levy and his son, Daniel Levy, star in Schitt's Creek on the CBC and Pop TV. The Levys talk with NPR's Scott Simon about the comedy, family dynamics and what it's like to work together.
